sections.paragraph: + Son of Esau by Aholiabamah the daughter of Anah, the son of Zebeon the Hivite. (Genesis 36:6,14,18; 1 Chronicles 1:35) (B.C. after 1797.) + A Benjamite, son of Bilhah. (1 Chronicles 7:10,11) + A Gershonite Levite, of the house of Shimei. (1 Chronicles 23:10,11) (B.C. 1014.) + Son of Rehoboam king of Judah. (2 Chronicles 11:18,19) (B.C. after 97.)
